Title: A Picture From Life's Other Side
Plot: Rayna finds an unlikely ally in Lamar when he sides with her against Teddy about the girls. Jolene sees Juliette struggling and tries to find a way to help. Avery and Will, separately, both get a chance to shine with bigger stars -- but will it translate to career gold? And Tandy takes her own agenda to the board of Wyatt Industries.
GuestStars: Judith Hoag, Chris Carmack, Sylvia Jefferies, Lennon Stella, Maisy Stella, Jay Hernandez
